DISTRICT.name: Lower East Fisp
DISTRICT.desc: Academic: Scholar’s hovel, schoolhouse, alchemist’s laboratory, library, archives, observatory, university

DISTRICT.name: Tais Town
DISTRICT.desc: Craft: Blacksmith, tanner’s row, maker’s street, guild canton, loomworks,

DISTRICT.name: Upper East Winwoopt
DISTRICT.desc: Culture: Tavern, playhouse, horse track, theater, tournament lists, menagerie, concert hall, arena, circus, colosseum,

DISTRICT.name: Upper West Spadlork
DISTRICT.desc: Foreign: An area defined by its cultural, ethnic, political, or linguistic composition –dwarftown, the foreign legation, the goblin ghetto, the Halfling hillside. Language skills, Cultural Familiarities, Savoir Faire etc are appropriate.

DISTRICT.name: Pleecerd Vale
DISTRICT.desc: Graveyard: Graveyard, cemetery, crypt, mausoleum, necropolis

DISTRICT.name: Downtown Scroppand
DISTRICT.desc: Green: Common, green, herbalist, fishery, garden, lumberyard, granary, farm, parkland,

DISTRICT.name: Remmest Side
DISTRICT.desc: Hazardous: Old well, abandoned mine, crumbling ruins of the old town, sinkhole, blood forest, scree slope, buried canton, magma pit

DISTRICT.name: Midtown Cledard
DISTRICT.desc: Historic: Old inn, founder’s house, ancient city, ruins district

DISTRICT.name: West Loattoatnift Grove
DISTRICT.desc: Law and Order: Guardhouse, watchtower, gallows, gaol, prison, courthouse

DISTRICT.name: Splofiloast Valley
DISTRICT.desc: Military: Barracks, parade grounds, archery range, tower, armory, keep, castle, citadel

DISTRICT.name: Lower East Gald
DISTRICT.desc: Money: Pawnbroker, moneylender, jeweler, bank, gemcutter, mint

DISTRICT.name: South Spleld
DISTRICT.desc: Plaza: Well, fountain, stele, statue, piazza, plinth, monument, town square, park, plaza, grand arcade

DISTRICT.name: Girveb Road
DISTRICT.desc: Poor: Shack, orphanage, slums, workhouse, shanty town

DISTRICT.name: Lower South Glostes
DISTRICT.desc: Portage: Jetty, roadhouse, mooring, stables, shipwright, lighthouse, caravanserai, lumberyard, docks, tradehouse, port, harbor,

DISTRICT.name: Newup Row
DISTRICT.desc: Public: Amenity Well, common, leech, orphanage, public baths, surgeon, hospice,

DISTRICT.name: South Naippais
DISTRICT.desc: Religious: Sacred font, shrine, temple, monastery, church, abbey, cathedral, ecclesiastical courts

DISTRICT.name: Upper Skugailt
DISTRICT.desc: Rich: Gentleman’s house, manor, finishing school, mansion, manor district,

DISTRICT.name: Cloowergost Cross
DISTRICT.desc: Ruling: Town hall, lord’s manor, palace

DISTRICT.name: Leorioctelf Circle
DISTRICT.desc: Trade: Stall, trader’s row, market, auction house, fish market, guild-house, merchant’s guild, grand bazaar,

DISTRICT.name: Citrine Woods
DISTRICT.desc: Underworld: Back alley, mugger’s row, gang turf, smuggler’s den, thieves district. Streetwise rolls definitely required!
